Name: Spark
Description: Fire a bolt of 1 Lightning Damage.
Lore: A spark of inginuity, flickering to your target and giving them a gentle jolt.

Name: Minor Kinesis
Description: You make an object levitate and can move it through the air up to 6 units, it remains suspended each turn you recast this spell, cannot be used for combat.
Lore: To make a stone levitate, the first spell most young casters learn.

Name: Arcane Gust
Description: Upon taking melee damage, you may push the creature that injured you away by 3 units.
Lore: A defensive burst to make some distance.

Name: Kinetic Swing
Description: Perform a melee strike with your weapon, it deals +1 Force Damage.
Lore: To strengthen the very core of a weapon, simply charge it up with mana!

Name: Force Nudge
Description: Attempt to displace a target by 1 unit in any direction to a valid position, they must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Lore: If you ever don't like where someone is standing, give em a lil nudge.

Name: Sphere of force
Description: Command an area to experiance higher gravity, dealing 1 force damage to all creatures in the radius, they must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Lore: Their knees will hurt after that!

Name: Mana Sense
Description: You can see the flow of mana around you, you can identify what type of magic an item/creature is emitting.
Lore: To see the fabric of reali- oh wait, it just makes that guy glow blue.

Name: Arcane Mark
Description: Mark a creature, the next spell you cast against that creature, deals +1 Lightning Damage.
Lore: A focused mote of magic awaits the next moment of weakness.

Name: Static Veil
Description: Coat yourself in lightning, the next creature that hits you takes 1 damage.
Lore: Like rubbing socks on a carpet, make yourself a lil zappy!

Name: Focus
Description: Grant yourself +2 Accuracy on your next Melee/Ranged attack.
Lore: Take a moment, take a breath.

Name: Mana Lance
Description: Fire a condensed lance of mana, dealing 2 Force Damage to a creature.
Lore: Raw mana, sharpened into purpose.

Name: Force Shear
Description: Perform a melee weapon attack that deals +1 Force Damage and ignores 1 point of Armor.
Upcast: Increase the bonus Force Damage by +1.
Lore: A precise cut, slipping between reality’s defenses.

Name: Aether Step
Description: Teleport up to 5 units to a location you can see.
Lore: The space between moments bends to practiced will.

Name: Spell Shunt
Description: When you take damage from a spell, reduce the damage by 2.
Lore: Magic diverted is magic denied.

Name: Mana Snare
Description: You bind a creature in constricting mana, reducing their movement by 3 units until the end of their next turn. They must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Upcast: Increase the movement reduction by +1 unit.
Lore: Mana does not forgive those who struggle blindly.

Name: Arcane Anchor
Description: Anchor a creature in place. They cannot be forcibly moved until the start of your next turn. They must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Upcast: Extend the duration by 1 additional turn.
Lore: Reality itself grips tight at your command.

Name: Unstable Surge
Description: Your next spell this turn deals +2 damage, but you take 1 Force Damage.
Lore: Power taken too quickly always leaves scars.

Name: Kinetic Ripple
Description: Release a wave of kinetic force, dealing 2 Force Damage and pushing all affected creatures 2 units away. Creatures must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Lore: A shockwave born from sudden intent.

Name: Mana Lock
Description: A creature you touch has their next spell cost +1 mana. They must roll [Insight] to resist.
Upcast: Affects the next additional spell the creature casts.
Lore: Knowledge remains — access does not.

Name: Refraction Veil
Description: When you are hit by an attack or spell, impose -2 Accuracy on that roll.
Lore: Light bends, fate follows.

Lore: Advanced magic of the Arcane school, rarely seen by the uninitiated.

Upcast: Allows you to craft items of a higher tier or repair an additional item.
Lore: A master artisan is never without their tools, even in the heart of a dungeon.

Name: Sacred Glimmer
Description: You grant a creature a mote of healing, next time they get healed increase it by 1
Lore: A faint light answers even the quietest prayer.

Name: Guiding Touch
Description: Grant a touched creature +2 Accuracy on their next attack or spell.
Lore: Faith steadies the hand when doubt would make it tremble.

Name: Faith Ward
Description: When you take damage, reduce that damage by 1.
Lore: Belief is sometimes enough to turn a fatal blow aside.

Name: Hallowed Mark
Description: Mark a creature. The next attack made against that creature deals +1 Light Damage.
Lore: Light finds those who cannot hide from judgment.

Name: Mercy Spark
Description: Deal 1 Light Damage to a creature, or instead stabilize a creature to 1 Health.
Lore: Mercy and punishment share the same flame.

Name: Oathbound Focus
Description: Once per turn, when you deal damage, you may change the damage type to Light.
Lore: An oath shapes not just action, but intent.

Name: Consecrated Step
Description: You move up to 3 units without provoking reactions.
Lore: Where you tread, the faithful path opens.

Name: Light of Resolve
Description: When a creature within range fails a roll, grant them +2 to that roll after seeing the result.
Lore: Resolve shines brightest at the moment of failure.

Name: Sanctum Whisper
Description: You sense the presence of celestials, fiends, or consecrated areas within range.
Lore: The divine speaks softly, but never without purpose.

Name: Blessed Vigil
Description: Your total health increases by 2
Lore: Faith never truly sleeps.

Name: Light Lance
Description: Hurl a lance of holy light, dealing 2 Light Damage to a creature you can see.
Lore: Faith given form, sharp and unwavering.

Name: Sacred Intercession
Description: When a creature within range would take damage, reduce that damage by 2.
Lore: A hand reaches out before the blow can land.

Name: Oathbound Strike
Description: Make a melee weapon attack. On hit, it deals +2 Light Damage and the target cannot gain bonuses to Accuracy until the end of their next turn.
Upcast: Increase the bonus Light Damage by +1.
Lore: An oath strikes truer than steel alone.

Name: Beacon of Resolve
Description: Choose a creature you can see. Until the start of your next turn, they gain +2 Accuracy and cannot be [Frightened].
Upcast: Extend the duration by 1 additional turn.
Lore: Hope shines brightest when shared.

Name: Merciful Pulse
Description: A wave of gentle light heals a creature for 2 Health or deals 2 Light Damage to an undead or fiend.
Upcast: Increase the healing or damage by +1.
Lore: Mercy and judgment flow from the same source.

Name: Vowbound Focus
Description: Once per turn, when you uphold an oath or divine tenet determined by the Narrator, gain +1 Accuracy on your next attack or spell.
Lore: Conviction rewards the faithful.

Name: Hallowed Ground
Description: A 2 unit radius area around you becomes Hallowed ground, Allies gain +2 Movement, enemies gain -2 Movement.
Lore: Each step leaves a trace of purpose.

Name: Lightbound Rebuke
Description: When you are hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 2 Light Damage.
Lore: To strike the faithful is to invite the light’s reply.

Name: Sanctified Mark
Description: Mark a creature with holy sigils. The next attack made against that creature deals +2 Light Damage.
Lore: Judgment does not forget its target.

Name: Blessed Sanctuary
Description: Each scene you and 1 nearby ally within 3 units recover 1 Health, as long as you are concious.
Lore: Some prayers are never lowered.

Description: Call down holy power to heal 2 Health or deal 2 Light damage to enemies.

Name: Whispers
Description: You attempt to impose -2 Accuracy onto a creature you can see, they must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: Whispers to cloud the mind, whispers to cloud the soul.

Name: Maw of the Void
Description: Upon taking damage, you attempt to deal 2 Damage to the target that struck you, they must roll [Reflex] to resist.
Lore: Let the teeth of the void sink into their soul.

Name: Mind Needle
Description: Fire a needle of 2 Pshycic Damage.
Lore: A sharp pain through the eye, your mind is left questioning what it just felt.

Name: Grim Focus
Description: Your weapon damage is treated as Dark in addition to any other type.
Lore: Envelope your blade in the fog of death.

Name: Echo Hex
Description: You create a hexed Tile, the Hex is invisible, any creature that steps atop it must succeed a [Reflex] check or take 1 Dark Damage, then the tile disapates. You may only have 1 Hex up at a time.
Lore: A minor curse placed upon reality, confined to a single moment.

Name: Reflexive strike
Description: When a creature casts a spell, attempt to deal 1 Dark Damage to them, they must roll [Reflex] to resist.
Lore: Don't let them get away with it.

Name: Dread Murmur
Description: Release a cone of dark energy, dealing 1 Dark Damage and [Fearing] all creatures caught in the cone, they must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Lore: A smog of horror, like screaming faces, spews fourth staining all in its way.

Name: Mark of Unease
Description: You attempt to impose -2 Insight onto a creature, they must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: Use their own mind against themselves.

Name: Lingering Glance
Description: You lock eyes with a creature you can see. The next time they take damage before your next turn, they take +1 Psychic Damage. They must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: A look that crawls beneath the skin, refusing to be forgotten.

Name: Fracture Thought
Description: You attempt to splinter a creature’s focus, imposing -2 Accuracy on their next spell or attack. They must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: A single doubt, driven deep enough, can unravel intent entirely.

Name: Vein Hex
Description: Curse a creature’s blood, dealing 2 Dark Damage. The next time they take damage before your next turn, they take +1 additional Dark Damage. They must roll [Fortitude] to resist the curse.
Lore: The body remembers what the soul tries to forget.

Name: Mind Sunder
Description: You tear at a creature’s psyche, dealing 2 Psychic Damage and imposing -2 Insight until the end of their next turn. They must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: Thought is fragile when pulled from the wrong angle.

Name: Grasping Doubt
Description: Manifest spectral hands that reduce a creature’s movement by 2 units and impose -2 Accuracy until the end of their next turn. They must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: Hesitation clings tighter than chains.

Name: Shadow Slip
Description: When you take damage, you may teleport up to 3 units to an unoccupied space you can see, halving the damage.
Upcast: Increase the teleport distance by +2 units.
Lore: Pain is just another doorway.

Name: Echoing Curse
Description: Curse a creature. The next time they fail a roll before your next turn, they take 2 Dark Damage.
Lore: Mistakes linger longer when invited.

Name: Dread Focus
Description: Once per turn, when you deal Dark or Psychic Damage, impose -2 Accuracy on the target until the end of their next turn.
Lore: Fear sharpens attention — yours, not theirs.

Name: Blood Whisper
Description: Deal 2 Dark Damage to a creature. If the target is [Bleeding], they instead take +1 additional Dark Damage.
Lore: The blood knows secrets the mouth refuses to tell.

Name: Veil Fracture
Description: Shatter the boundary between fear and reality, dealing 2 Dark Damage and [Fearing] all creatures in the cone. Creatures must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: The veil breaks easiest where terror has already worn it thin.

Name: Soul Tether
Description: Bind your soul to a creature. Until the start of your next turn, when they take damage, you regain 1 Health. They must roll [Insight] to resist.
Lore: Suffering shared is suffering diminished.

Name: Night’s Interruption
Description: When a creature within range casts a spell, impose -2 Accuracy on that spell and deal 1 Psychic Damage. They must roll [Reflex] to resist.
Lore: Even darkness dislikes being disturbed.

Name: Syphoning Bite
Description: You manefest a crimson maw and attempt to take a bite out of a creature. Make a melee spell attack, it deals 2 Dark damage, and heals you for 4 health on a sucessful hit.
Upcast: Increases the damage by 1, and the healing by 2.
Lore: Hunger can only be aided by a good chomp.

Name: Pierce Hex
Description: Invokes dark powers to deal 2 Psychic damage. (Note: Powerful, but usually restricted to lower levels).
Lore: Advanced magic of the Occult school, rarely seen by the uninitiated.

Name: Grave Brand
Description: Brand a creature with a sigil of death, dealing 3 Dark Damage. Until the end of your next turn, the first time that creature takes damage, they take an additional 2 Dark Damage.
Upcast: Increase the triggered Dark Damage by +1.
Lore: Once marked, the grave watches closely.

Name: Mind Rend
Description: Rip violently through a creature’s thoughts, dealing 3 Psychic Damage and imposing -3 Insight until the end of their next turn. They must roll [Insight] to resist the Insight reduction.
Lore: Some ideas are better left intact.

Name: Lingering Malice
Description: Inflict a curse upon a creature for 2 turns. At the start of each of their turns, they take 1 Dark Damage and suffer -1 Accuracy.
Lore: Hatred rarely leaves all at once.

Name: Umbral Reversal
Description: When you would be reduced to 0 Health, instead remain at 1 Health and teleport up to 4 units to a space you can see. This spell then ends.
Upcast: Increase the teleport distance by +2 units.
Lore: Death reached — then missed.

Name: Hex Collapse
Description: Detonate active curses and hexes in the area. Creatures affected by a curse take 2 Dark Damage, while un-cursed creatures take 1 Dark Damage.
Upcast: Increase the damage dealt to cursed creatures by +1.
Lore: All debts come due at once.

Name: Bloodbound Focus
Description: Once per turn, when you take damage, your next attack or spell before the end of your next turn deals +2 damage.
Lore: Pain sharpens purpose.

Name: Writ of Agony
Description: Inscribe a sigil of torment on a creature, dealing 2 Dark Damage and imposing [Fearing] until the end of their next turn. They must roll [Fortitude] to resist the fear.
Lore: Suffering, formalized and signed.

Name: Veil Sink
Description: Create a zone of oppressive darkness in a 2-unit radius for 1 turn. Creatures inside the zone suffer -2 Accuracy and take 1 Dark Damage when they enter it.
Lore: The world grows heavier where the veil thins.

Name: Soul Fracture
Description: Shatter part of a creature’s soul, dealing 3 Psychic Damage. The target cannot benefit from healing until the end of their next turn. They must roll [Insight] to resist the healing suppression.
Lore: Not all wounds are meant to close.

Name: Black Intercession
Description: When a creature within range would deal damage, reduce that damage by 3 and deal 2 Dark Damage to the source.
Lore: The dark protects its own — at a price.

Lore: A foundational technique taught to initiates of the Cosmic tradition.

Description: A minor manifestation of cosmic energy that deals 1 damage to a target within range.

Name: Starlance
Description: Hurl a lance of condensed starlight, dealing 2 Light Damage.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, each additional cast may target a different creature.
Lore: A falling star, aimed by will alone.

Name: Void Drift
Description: You move up to 4 units, ignoring reactions and difficult terrain.
Lore: Space loosens its grip for those who know how to let go.

Name: Astral Flare
Description: A creature you can see takes 2 Light Damage and suffers -2 Accuracy on its next attack.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, each additional cast may target a different creature.
Lore: Light burns brightest where attention wavers.

Name: Orbit Shift
Description: When you are targeted by an attack or spell, you may shift 2 units to an unoccupied space you can see.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, each additional cast reduces the taken damage by 2.
Lore: Nothing strikes the same point twice if the stars disagree.

Name: Gravitic Nudge
Description: Push or pull a creature 2 units in a direction of your choice. They must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, the direction may change between each cast.
Lore: Gravity is merely a suggestion.

Name: Starbound Focus
Description: Once per turn, when you cast a Cosmic spell, gain +1 Accuracy on the next spell you cast this turn.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, the Accuracy bonus applies to each subsequent spell in the sequence.
Lore: Alignment breeds clarity.

Name: Celestial Thread
Description: Bind yourself to a creature you touch. Until the end of your next turn, whenever either of you moves a unit, the other may move 1 unit as well.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, you may bind to an additional creature.
Lore: All things move together, whether they wish to or not.

Name: Event Horizon Blink
Description: When you would take damage, reduce that damage by 1 and teleport 3 units to a space you can see.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, you may delay the teleport until after another spell resolves this turn.
Lore: There is always a way around the fall.

Name: Astral Echo
Description: Choose a creature you can see. The next time you cast a Cosmic spell targeting a different creature this turn, the chosen creature takes 1 Light Damage.
Upcast: This spell can only be cast once per multicast.
Lore: The stars remember what you almost aimed for.

Name: Stellar Pressure
Description: Creatures in the cone take 2 Force Damage and are pushed 1 unit away from you. They must roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, you may rotate the cone between casts.
Lore: The weight of the heavens bears down all at once.

Name: Speck of Stardust
Description: A speck of stardust orbits you, it will fly to the last enemy you targeted and attempt to deal 1 Light Damage. They must roll [Reflex] to resist
Upcast: When multicasting this spell, it waits until all other spells are cast, then increases the number of Specks per spell cast. All Specks release simultaneously.
Lore: A small pinch of dust from the stars themselves, its as bright as a star, and as faint as a firefly

Name: Edge of Horizon
Description: You create a micro black hole for 2 turns. It has a 3×3 area of rough terrain; creatures inside must roll [Fortitude] each turn or be pulled to the center. Creatures at the center take 1 Force damage at the start of every creature’s turn.
Upcast: This spell cannot be cast alongside other spells. Recasting it either creates an additional black hole or increases an existing one’s size and duration by 1.
Lore: While small, it is powerful, an expresion of the everlasting will of space.

Name: Align Supernova
Description: Channel the void to displace enemies or deal 2 Light damage.
Upcast: No standard upcast; spend more Mana to multicast Level 1 spells instead.
Lore: Advanced magic of the Cosmic school, rarely seen by the uninitiated.

Name: Ember Flick
Description: Deal 1 Fire Damage to a creature or ignite a small flammable object.
Lore: A flame barely born, yet eager to grow.

Name: Static Tap
Description: When you hit a creature with an attack, deal +1 Lightning Damage.
Lore: The storm answers instinctively.

Name: Frost Pulse
Description: Deal 1 Cold Damage and reduce the target’s movement by 1 unit until their next turn.
Lore: Cold does not rush. It claims.

Name: Stone Skim
Description: You ignore difficult terrain caused by earth or stone.
Lore: The ground remembers those who listen to it.

Name: Gale Nudge
Description: Push a creature or unsecured object 2 units in a direction of your choice. Creatures may roll [Fortitude] to resist.
Lore: Even the gentlest wind knows where it wants you to go.

Name: Ash Veil
Description: When you take damage, impose -2 Accuracy on the next attack made against you.
Lore: Smoke and embers blur hostile intent.

Name: Ripple Spark
Description: Deal 1 Lightning or Cold Damage to a creature you touch.
Lore: Energy flows like water, if you know how to stir it.

Name: Thermal Shift
Description: You gain resistance to either Fire or Cold damage until your next turn.
Lore: Heat and cold are just states of balance.

Name: Pressure Ping
Description: You sense the movement of creatures behind cover or in obscured areas until the start of your next turn.
Lore: Air shifts. Water trembles. Nothing moves unseen.

Name: Charge Residue
Description: Once per turn after casting an Elemental spell, your next attack deals +1 damage of the same type.
Lore: Power always leaves something behind.

Name: Howling Tide

Name: Storm Bolt
Description: Hurl a compressed bolt of lightning at a target in range. The target takes 2 Lightning Damage and is briefly jolted, reducing its next movement by 3 units.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase damage by +1. Level 3+: Jolt also prevents reactions until the start of the target’s next turn.
Lore: Stormcasters claim lightning remembers the path it takes, striking foes along lines only the sky can see.

Name: Stone Guard
Description: When you would take damage, harden your skin with earthen force, reducing the incoming damage by 2.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase damage reduction by 1. Level 3+: Gain brief resistance to the triggering damage type.
Lore: Those who trust the earth are never truly unguarded, even when standing alone.

Name: Flame Step
Description: Ignite beneath your feet and instantly move up to 3 units. Enemies within 1 unit of your starting space take 2 Fire damage.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase movement by 2 unit. Level 3+: Leave a burning space behind until the end of the round.
Lore: Fire is impatient by nature, always urging its wielder forward.

Name: Frost Mark
Description: Mark a creature with chilling runes. Until the end of its next turn, its movement is reduced by 3 units and the next attack against it deals +2 Ice damage.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase duration by 1 round. Level 3+: Frost damage bonus applies to all attacks against the target during the duration.
Lore: Cold remembers every wound, preserving pain like a perfect crystal.

Name: Inferno Pulse
Description: Release a burst of searing flame in a short cone. Creatures in the area take 2 Fire damage and ignite, taking 1 Fire damage at the start of their next turn. They must roll [Reflex] to resist.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase cone size by 1 unit. Level 3+: Ignite damage increases by 1 and lasts an additional round.
Lore: Infernos are born not from rage, but from certainty that nothing should remain.

Name: Eye of the storm
Description: Your control over lightning sharpens. Once per turn, when you deal Lightning damage, you may increase that damage by 1 or reduce the targets movement by 3.
Upcast: Level 2+: May trigger twice per round. Level 3+: Reduction increases to 5.
Lore: To master the storm is not to command it, but to move at its pace.

Name: Cinders of Avarice
Description: Imbue a willing creature or weapon with smoldering fire. The next successful strike it makes deals +1 Fire damage.
Upcast: Level 2+: Effect lasts for two successful strikes. Level 3+: Bonus Fire damage increases by 2.
Lore: An ember shared is never diminished—only multiplied.

Name: Tidal Rebound
Description: When targeted by a ranged attack, conjure a surge of water that deflects the blow, reducing damage by 2 and pushing the attacker 1 unit.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase damage reduction by 2. Level 3+: Push increases by 2 units.
Lore: Water does not stop an attack—it teaches it where not to land.

Name: Earthquake
Description: Cause the ground beneath a creature to rupture. The target takes 1 Vibro damage and must choose to either be knocked prone or lose an action on its next turn.
Upcast: Level 2+: Target suffers both effects. Level 3+: Nearby ground becomes difficult terrain for one round.
Lore: The earth does not strike swiftly—but when it moves, all must answer.

Name: Aether Sense
Description: You attune to elemental currents. You can sense the presence of strong elemental effects, active spells, or elemental creatures within a short distance.
Upcast: Level 2+: Increase sensing range to 12 units. Level 3+: You can identify the dominant element and its intensity.
Lore: Aether is the breath between elements, heard only by those who listen.
